title: Kayn/Zed Ultimate
body:
With Zed's ultimate; if the target is killed whilst your are hovering above the target, Zed's Ultimate goes onto a 6 second CD. Kayn's ultimate; if cast on an enemy who is killed whilst hovering above the target, will go onto a full CD.

To me both ultimate's are similar in effects yet one gets a massive advantage and the other makes you look like your lost... 

thoughts on making Kayn's Ultimate have a 6 second CD reset if target is killed whilst your are hovering above?

replies.body: But kayn is hovering for much much longer. So if this was case he could just hide in enemies and wait untill team kills them and then hide in more enemies..
